name: help2comp
description: Completion generator from --help or man pages

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect --require node-env-dev --require ts-node/register/transpile-only src/main.ts
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --quiet --no-stdin --watch src --ext ts --exec 'node --inspect --require node-env-dev --require ts-node/register/transpile-only' src/main.ts

author: Robert Laverty <roblav96@gmail.com> (https://github.com/roblav96)
